<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Populate the sys_cb_document_context_profile and sys_cs_document_context_profile tables.</description>
        <name>Populate document context profile tables</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function insertSysCbDocumentProfile(docId, profileId, domain, sysPackage) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_cb_document_context_profile');
    gr.addQuery('document',docId);
    gr.addQuery('context_profile', profileId);
    gr.addQuery('sys_domain', domain);
    gr.addQuery('sys_package', sysPackage);
    gr.query();
    if (!gr.next()) {
        var newGr = new GlideRecord('sys_cb_document_context_profile');
        newGr.initialize();
        newGr.setValue('document', docId);
        newGr.setValue('document_table', 'sys_cb_topic');
        newGr.setValue('context_profile', profileId);
        newGr.setValue('sys_domain', domain);
        newGr.setValue('sys_package', sysPackage);
        newGr.insert();
        gs.info('Inserted sys_cb_document_context_profile record for document ' + docId + ' with context profile ' + profileId);
    }
}

function insertSysCsDocumentProfile(docId, profileId, domain, sysPackage) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_cs_document_context_profile');
    gr.addQuery('document',docId);
    gr.addQuery('context_profile', profileId);
    gr.addQuery('sys_domain', domain);
    gr.addQuery('sys_package', sysPackage);
    gr.query();
    if (!gr.next()) {
        var newGr = new GlideRecord('sys_cs_document_context_profile');
        newGr.initialize();
        newGr.setValue('document', docId);
        newGr.setValue('document_table', 'sys_cs_topic');
        newGr.setValue('context_profile', profileId);
        newGr.setValue('sys_domain', domain);
        newGr.setValue('sys_package', sysPackage);
        newGr.insert();
        gs.info('Inserted sys_cs_document_context_profile record for document ' + docId + ' with context profile ' + profileId);
    }
}

var cbGr = new GlideRecord('sys_cb_topic');
cbGr.addNotNullQuery('context_profiles');
cbGr.query();
while (cbGr.next()) {
    var cbTopicId = cbGr.getValue('sys_id');
    var cbDomain = cbGr.getValue('sys_domain');
    var cbPackage = cbGr.getValue('sys_package');
    var profiles = cbGr.getValue('context_profiles').split(',');

    profiles.forEach(function(profileId) {
        insertSysCbDocumentProfile(cbTopicId, profileId, cbDomain, cbPackage);
    });

    // clean up the context_profiles field since it's no longer used
    cbGr.autoSysFields(false);
    cbGr.setValue('context_profiles', '');
    cbGr.update();
    gs.info('Cleared context_profiles for sys_cb_topic ' + cbTopicId);
}

var contextProfileTopicGr = new GlideRecord('sys_cs_context_profile_topic');

// skip overrides that do not contain topic ids or aren't LLM topics
contextProfileTopicGr.addNotNullQuery("topic");
contextProfileTopicGr.addQuery("topic.model_type", "llm");
contextProfileTopicGr.query();
while (contextProfileTopicGr.next()) {
    var cpTopicId = contextProfileTopicGr.getValue('topic');
    var cpProfileId = contextProfileTopicGr.getValue('context_profile');
    var cpDomain = contextProfileTopicGr.getValue('sys_domain');
    var cpPackage = contextProfileTopicGr.getValue('sys_package');
    insertSysCsDocumentProfile(cpTopicId, cpProfileId, cpDomain, cpPackage);

    // get the cb_topic_id from the sys_cs_topic record so we can use it for the sys_cb_document_context_profile table check
    var cpCsTopicGr = new GlideRecord('sys_cs_topic');
    cpCsTopicGr.addQuery('sys_id', cpTopicId);
    cpCsTopicGr.query();
    if (cpCsTopicGr.next()) {
        var cpCbTopicId = cpCsTopicGr.getValue('cb_topic_id');
        insertSysCbDocumentProfile(cpCbTopicId, cpProfileId, cpDomain, cpPackage);
    }
}

var contextProfileSkillGr = new GlideRecord('sys_cs_context_profile_skill');
contextProfileSkillGr.query();
while (contextProfileSkillGr.next()) {
    var cpsDomain = contextProfileSkillGr.getValue('sys_domain');
    var cpsProfileId = contextProfileSkillGr.getValue('context_profile');
    var cpSkillId = contextProfileSkillGr.getValue('skill_id');
    var cpsPackage = contextProfileSkillGr.getValue('sys_package');
    var genAiSkillGr = new GlideRecord('sys_gen_ai_skill');
    genAiSkillGr.addQuery('sys_id', cpSkillId);
    genAiSkillGr.addQuery('skill_table', 'sys_cs_topic');
    genAiSkillGr.query();
    if (genAiSkillGr.next()) {
        var cpsCsTopicId = genAiSkillGr.getValue('skill_document');
        insertSysCsDocumentProfile(cpsCsTopicId, cpsProfileId, cpsDomain, cpsPackage);
    }
}

]]></script>
